import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import ResumePrice from '../resumePrice/ResumePrice' import CarouselSlider from '../carruselSlider/carruselSlider' import { useContext } from "react"; import Context from "../provider/context" import "./cart.css" export default function Cart() { const { store,removeFromCart} = useContext(Context); return (

Productos en el carrito :

{store.map((product, index) => (

{product.nombre}

Precio:

{product.precio}

Cantidad:

{product.quantity}

))}
) }
